docs: Developed a recommendation system based on semantic analysis and similarity measurement, combining fine-tuned BERT embeddings with matrix factorization techniques to generate personalized and context-aware recommendations.

Developed and optimized Golang RESTful APIs supporting scalable AI workflows for model inference and customer data transmission; enabled real-time data processing and storage in BigQuery and AlloyDB, ensuring seamless data retrieval and AI-powered decision-making.
Implemented and optimized CI/CD pipelines using Cloud Build and Cloud Functions to automate deployment processes, improving system stability, observability, and operational efficiency.

Built a scalable, customized analytics dashboard by integrating LookerML, Looker Extension API, Cloud Run, and Gemini; unified multi-source data to generate actionable AI-driven insights for business intelligence.

Designed and deployed AI chatbots for Commercial & Consumer use cases using RAG architecture combined with GPT-4/3.5, supporting both English and Japanese; significantly improved document retrieval efficiency and reduced customer support workload by 43%.
Integrated Azure AI Search as the vector store to manage retrievable embedding vectors; monitored vector index size and capacity to ensure optimal retrieval performance and cost-efficiency.
Fine-tuned LLMs with product knowledge and brand-specific tone, enhancing response consistency and accuracy in customer interactions.

Implemented Responsible AI mechanisms within the RAG framework, monitoring and validating LLM inputs and outputs against predefined rules and ethical standards to improve content safety and trustworthiness.
Collaborated with the Data Team to complete ETL pipelines and integrated structured data into Azure SQL; worked closely with UI/UX designers to co-develop a user-facing interface.
Advanced to the final round in Fukuoka, Japan, at an AI Hackathon, demonstrating technical innovation and cross-functional collaboration.
Contributed to backend system development to enhance platform performance and scalability for production-level applications.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to ensure seamless integration of new features into the beanfun! mobile app, aligning user experience with technical implementation.
